Khonkolor::

Khonkolor turned his body and saw the globe and jumped to a side; the 
globe exploted and Khonkolor was safe... by now. The male 
shouted "Hey you Bon-whaterver is your name, are you Predacon??"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Bongiovi:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Raising his mighty axe, the grenade exploded against it, protecting 
Bongiovi 
> from the explosion and most of the shrapnel.  He hissed, taking a 
quick 
> glance at his axe noting it was still intact.  He spat a large glob 
of acid 
> down at Khonkolor's back.
